description:
To help Komi make more friends, Tadano tries to enlist the help of a talkative classmate who`s friends with everyone, but they promptly turn him down.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: It`s Just a Childhood Friend. / I`m Not a Killer. / It`s Just My First Errand.
Osananajimi Desu. / Koroshiya ja Nai Desu. / Hajimete no Otsukai Desu.
Znamy się z dzieciństwa. I więcej.
幼馴染です. / 殺し屋じゃないです. / はじめてのおつかいです.
